Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 115th/Laflin
ShortDescription: #115 buses temp. rerouted SB via 115th, Halsted, 111th, Marshfield; Ashland-Hamlet, 111th, Halsted, 115th, due to police activity near 115th/Laflin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 115th/Laflin due to police activity .

Southbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 111th, and Marshfield, then resume their normal route on 115th.

Northbound buses will operate via Ashland-Hamlet, 111th, and Halsted, then resume their normal route on 115th

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion an earlier delay at Thorndale. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion an earlier delay at Thorndale. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line & Midway-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line & Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays an earlier sick passenger at Roosevelt. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line & Midway-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays an earlier sick passenger at Roosevelt. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
